exec vbash -log input
cmp stdout output

-- input --
diff -wu <(nested_test_dirs) <(nested_test_dirs | grep -v -f <(nested_test_dir_patterns))
-- output --

trap 'echo Error on linue ${OUR_LINE_NO} in ${OUR_SOURCE_FILE}' ERR

OUR_SOURCE_FILE="input"
{
  OUR_LINE_NO=1
  cat <<'THISWILLNEVERMATCH'
> diff -wu <(nested_test_dirs) <(nested_test_dirs | grep -v -f <(nested_test_dir_patterns))
THISWILLNEVERMATCH
  diff -wu <(nested_test_dirs) <(nested_test_dirs | grep -v -f <(nested_test_dir_patterns))
}
